about_the_game:
Crimson Hills is a first-person horror game with a Lovecraftian twist. The Elder Gods have abandoned you to the void. Limbo… Or perhaps life. The distinction matters not; Both exist in the spaces in-between. Can you escape the dark horrors that call to you from the mist or will you be trapped in madness forever?

Delve into the fragmented mind of Ash Cole as he attempts to piece together his broken psyche

Uncover strange, terrifying areas and uncover their dark secrets

Attempt to survive a night at the mysterious Castle Baskerville

Hide and use your wits to survive the machinations of the Elder Gods
